message: Let's get this done quickly, Bob. Time is money!
Alice, your cut last round was a bit greedy.  Let's be reasonable, time is money for both of us.
Bob, my last offer is getting worse for both of us with the inflation. This is my final offer, take it or leave it.
Alice, it seems we're at an impasse. This is my final offer. Let's end this before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
